Rapid Salvager.name: Rapid Salvager
Rapid Salvager.description: Rapidly defeat combatants in Salvage activities.

Patience Perfected.name: Patience Perfected
Patience Perfected.description: Catch Legendary or Exotic fish at any Fish Pond.

Ritual Ornament.name: Ritual Ornament
Ritual Ornament.description: Acquire any ornament for the Seasonal ritual weapon.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Ethereal Might.name: Ethereal Might
Ethereal Might.description: Defeat targets with an Arc, Strand, or Void subclass equipped in Gambit. Bonus progress is granted for ability final blows and defeating Guardians.

Rapid Precision.description: Get rapid precision final blows. Bonus progress is granted for every defeated target after the second one.
